Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    org.codehaus.plexus.archiver.ArchiveFileFilter
    Use FileSelector
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.codehaus.plexus.archiver.util.FilterSupport
    Use FileSelector and Archiver.addFileSet(org.codehaus.plexus.archiver.FileSet).
    org.codehaus.plexus.archiver.filters.JarSecurityFileFilter
    Use JarSecurityFileSelector
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.codehaus.plexus.archiver.zip.AbstractZipArchiver.duplicate
    Use Archiver.setDuplicateBehavior(String) instead.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.codehaus.plexus.archiver.Archiver.addArchivedFileSet(File)
    Will go away in next major version
    org.codehaus.plexus.archiver.Archiver.addArchivedFileSet(File, String)
    Will go away in next major version
    org.codehaus.plexus.archiver.diags.DelgatingArchiver.addArchivedFileSet(File, String)
    org.codehaus.plexus.archiver.Archiver.addArchivedFileSet(File, String[], String[])
    Will go away in next major version
    org.codehaus.plexus.archiver.Archiver.addArchivedFileSet(File, String, String[], String[])
    Will go away in next major version
    org.codehaus.plexus.archiver.Archiver.addDirectory(File)
    Will go away in next major version
    org.codehaus.plexus.archiver.diags.DelgatingArchiver.addDirectory(File)
    org.codehaus.plexus.archiver.Archiver.addDirectory(File, String)
    Will go away in next major version
    org.codehaus.plexus.archiver.diags.DelgatingArchiver.addDirectory(File, String)
    org.codehaus.plexus.archiver.Archiver.addDirectory(File, String[], String[])
    Will go away in next major version
    org.codehaus.plexus.archiver.diags.DelgatingArchiver.addDirectory(File, String[], String[])
    org.codehaus.plexus.archiver.Archiver.addDirectory(File, String, String[], String[])
    Will go away in next major version
    org.codehaus.plexus.archiver.util.ArchiveEntryUtils.chmod(File, int, Logger)
    Use ArchiveEntryUtils.chmod(File, int)
    org.codehaus.plexus.archiver.util.ArchiveEntryUtils.chmod(File, int, Logger, boolean)
    Use ArchiveEntryUtils.chmod(File, int)
    org.codehaus.plexus.archiver.ArchiveEntry.getFile()
    As of 1.0-alpha-10, file entries are no longer backed by files, but by instances of PlexusIoResource. Consequently, you should use ArchiveEntry.getInputStream()-
    org.codehaus.plexus.archiver.Archiver.getFiles()
    Use Archiver.getResources()
    org.codehaus.plexus.archiver.AbstractArchiver.getRawDefaultFileMode()
    Use Archiver.getDefaultFileMode().
    org.codehaus.plexus.archiver.UnArchiver.isUseJvmChmod()
    this setting is now ignored. The jvm is always used.
    org.codehaus.plexus.archiver.Archiver.isUseJvmChmod()
    this setting is now ignored. The jvm is always used.
    org.codehaus.plexus.archiver.war.WarArchiver.setIgnoreWebxml(boolean)
    Use setExpectWebXml instead !
    org.codehaus.plexus.archiver.jar.JarArchiver.setManifestEncoding(String)
    org.codehaus.plexus.archiver.UnArchiver.setUseJvmChmod(boolean)
    this setting is now ignored. The jvm is always used.
    org.codehaus.plexus.archiver.Archiver.setUseJvmChmod(boolean)
    this setting is now ignored. The jvm is always used.
    org.codehaus.plexus.archiver.zip.ByteArrayOutputStream.toString()
    2.5 use ByteArrayOutputStream.toString(String) instead
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.codehaus.plexus.archiver.jar.Manifest(Reader)
    This constructor does not properly map characters to bytes. Use Manifest.Manifest(InputStream). Will be removed in 4.0.
